replies.bodyText:
More concise (less code, same outcome)
Better readability
Avoids extra allocation of an object array.
Doesn't do weird casting from object to entry.
The complexity of finding a max or min is O(n) instead of O(n log n) that good sorting algs have
Isn't painful to read (yes, i'm mentioning readability twice, because it is double as relevant).
